item.title: Let's Defend - WinRAR 0-Day
item.description: Description It seems there are many cracks for famous game. but it seems we downloaded the wrong one because it has a suspicious behavior and we need you to investigate it. Tools Tools Required 1- Volatility3 2- Notepad++ 3- Cyberchef 4- Exiftool | Metadata viewer Writeup Q1 What is the suspected process? Well we got a memory dump and we need to locate the suspicious process. so let’s use volatility to go through this challenge.
